channel.title: CVE Feed for PHOENIX CONTACT -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PHOENIX CONTACT -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-12517|2024-09-16T22:10:20.898Z -- phoenix%20contact -- axc%20f%201152%20%281151412%29
item.description: On Phoenix Contact PLCnext Control Devices versions before 2021.0 LTS an authenticated low privileged user could embed malicious Javascript code to gain admin rights when the admin user visits the vulnerable website (local privilege escalation).

item.title: CVE-2022-29898|2024-09-16T19:15:11.050Z -- phoenix%20contact -- rad-ism-900-en-bd%2Fb
item.description: On various RAD-ISM-900-EN-* devices by PHOENIX CONTACT an admin user could use the configuration file uploader in the WebUI to execute arbitrary code with root privileges on the OS due to an improper validation of an integrity check value in all versions of the firmware.

item.title: CVE-2016-8366|2024-09-16T21:08:54.504Z -- phoenix%20contact -- phoenix%20contact%20ilc%20plcs
item.description: Webvisit in Phoenix Contact ILC PLCs offers a password macro to protect HMI pages on the PLC against casual or coincidental opening of HMI pages by the user. The password macro can be configured in a way that the password is stored and transferred in clear text.

item.title: CVE-2021-34582|2024-09-16T20:11:38.654Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard
item.description: In Phoenix Contact FL MGUARD 1102 and 1105 in Versions 1.4.0, 1.4.1 and 1.5.0 a user with high privileges can inject HTML code (XSS) through web-based management or the REST API with a manipulated certificate file.

item.title: CVE-2022-31801|2024-09-16T18:50:12.497Z -- phoenix%20contact -- multiprog
item.description: An unauthenticated, remote attacker could upload malicious logic to the devices based on ProConOS/ProConOS eCLR in order to gain full control over the device.

item.title: CVE-2021-34560|2024-09-16T23:00:54.389Z -- phoenix%20contact -- wha-gw-f2d2-0-as-%20z2-eth
item.description: In PEPPERL+FUCHS WirelessHART-Gateway <= 3.0.9 a form contains a password field with autocomplete enabled. The stored credentials can be captured by an attacker who gains control over the user's computer. Therefore the user must have logged in at least once.

item.title: CVE-2022-31800|2024-09-16T16:54:13.463Z -- phoenix%20contact -- ilc%201x0
item.description: An unauthenticated, remote attacker could upload malicious logic to devices based on ProConOS/ProConOS eCLR in order to gain full control over the device.

item.title: CVE-2021-34598|2024-09-16T18:39:35.785Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard
item.description: In Phoenix Contact FL MGUARD 1102 and 1105 in Versions 1.4.0, 1.4.1 and 1.5.0 the remote logging functionality is impaired by the lack of memory release for data structures from syslog-ng when remote logging is active

item.title: CVE-2020-12523|2024-09-16T19:04:46.625Z -- phoenix%20contact -- tc%20mguard%20rs4000%204g%20vzw%20vpn%20%281010461%29
item.description: On Phoenix Contact mGuard Devices versions before 8.8.3 LAN ports get functional after reboot even if they are disabled in the device configuration. For mGuard devices with integrated switch on the LAN side, single switch ports can be disabled by device configuration. After a reboot these ports get functional independent from their configuration setting: Missing Initialization of Resource

item.title: CVE-2016-8371|2024-09-16T19:20:38.716Z -- phoenix%20contact -- phoenix%20contact%20ilc%20plcs
item.description: The web server in Phoenix Contact ILC PLCs can be accessed without authenticating even if the authentication mechanism is enabled.

item.title: CVE-2021-34559|2024-09-16T17:33:00.268Z -- phoenix%20contact -- wha-gw-f2d2-0-as-%20z2-eth
item.description: In PEPPERL+FUCHS WirelessHART-Gateway <= 3.0.8 a vulnerability may allow remote attackers to rewrite links and URLs in cached pages to arbitrary strings.

item.title: CVE-2016-8380|2024-09-16T22:56:53.125Z -- phoenix%20contact -- phoenix%20contact%20ilc%20plcs
item.description: The web server in Phoenix Contact ILC PLCs allows access to read and write PLC variables without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2021-34570|2024-09-16T22:09:31.616Z -- phoenix%20contact -- axc%20f
item.description: Multiple Phoenix Contact PLCnext control devices in versions prior to 2021.0.5 LTS are prone to a DoS attack through special crafted JSON requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-21004|2024-09-16T22:08:28.813Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20switch
item.description: In Phoenix Contact FL SWITCH SMCS series products in multiple versions an attacker may insert malicious code via LLDP frames into the web-based management which could then be executed by the client.

item.title: CVE-2021-34597|2024-09-16T18:09:20.367Z -- phoenix%20contact -- pc%20worx
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in PC Worx Automation Suite of Phoenix Contact up to version 1.88 could allow an attacker with a manipulated project file to unpack arbitrary files outside of the selected project directory.

item.title: CVE-2024-7698|2024-09-10T15:51:48.345Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can get access to CSRF tokens of higher privileged users which can be abused to mount CSRF attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-43392|2024-09-10T13:31:26.163Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can perform configuration changes of the firewall services, including packet filter, packet forwarding, network access control or NAT through the FW_INCOMING.FROM_IP FW_INCOMING.IN_IP FW_OUTGOING.FROM_IP FW_OUTGOING.IN_IP environment variable which can lead to a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-43389|2024-09-10T13:44:29.029Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can perform configuration changes of the ospf service through OSPF_INTERFACE.SIMPLE_KEY, OSPF_INTERFACE.DIGEST_KEY environment variables which can lead to a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-43390|2024-09-10T13:44:10.735Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can perform configuration changes of the firewall services, including packet forwarding or NAT through the FW_NAT.IN_IP environment variable which can lead to a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-43391|2024-09-10T13:43:56.307Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can perform configuration changes of the firewall services, including packet filter, packet forwarding, network access control or NAT through the FW_PORTFORWARDING.SRC_IP environment variable which can lead to a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-43393|2024-09-10T13:31:09.684Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can perform configuration changes of the firewall services, including packet filter, packet forwarding, network access control or NAT through the FW_INCOMING.FROM_IP FW_INCOMING.IN_IP FW_OUTGOING.FROM_IP FW_OUTGOING.IN_IP FW_RULESETS.FROM_IP FW_RULESETS.IN_IP environment variable which can lead to a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-6788|2024-08-13T16:50:38.588Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000
item.description: A remote unauthenticated attacker can use the firmware update feature on the LAN interface of the device to reset the password for the predefined, low-privileged user “user-app” to the default password.

item.title: CVE-2024-28137|2024-08-02T00:48:49.163Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000
item.description: A local attacker with low privileges can perform a privilege escalation with an init script due to a TOCTOU vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28135|2024-08-02T00:48:49.242Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can use a command injection vulnerability in the API which performs remote code execution as the user-app user due to improper input validation. The confidentiality is partly affected.

item.title: CVE-2024-28136|2024-08-02T00:48:49.214Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000
item.description: A local attacker with low privileges can use a command injection vulnerability to gain root privileges due to improper input validation using the OCPP Remote service.

item.title: CVE-2024-28133|2024-08-02T00:48:49.201Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000
item.description: A local low privileged attacker can use an untrusted search path in a CHARX system utility to gain root privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-28134|2024-08-02T00:48:49.289Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can extract a session token with a MitM attack and gain web-based management access with the privileges of the currently logged in user due to cleartext transmission of sensitive information. No additional user interaction is required. The access is limited as only non-sensitive information can be obtained but the availability can be seriously affected.

item.title: CVE-2024-28135|2024-06-06T15:24:54.870Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can use a command injection vulnerability in the API which performs remote code execution as the user-app user due to improper input validation. The confidentiality is partly affected.

item.title: CVE-2024-28134|2024-06-06T15:24:34.250Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can extract a session token with a MitM attack and gain web-based management access with the privileges of the currently logged in user due to cleartext transmission of sensitive information. No additional user interaction is required. The access is limited as only non-sensitive information can be obtained but the availability can be seriously affected.

item.title: CVE-2024-28133|2024-06-06T15:24:12.263Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000
item.description: A local low privileged attacker can use an untrusted search path in a CHARX system utility to gain root privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-28137|2024-06-06T15:25:47.839Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000
item.description: A local attacker with low privileges can perform a privilege escalation with an init script due to a TOCTOU vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28136|2024-06-06T15:25:25.119Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000
item.description: A local attacker with low privileges can use a command injection vulnerability to gain root privileges due to improper input validation using the OCPP Remote service.

item.title: CVE-2024-6788|2024-08-13T13:15:03.120Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000
item.description: A remote unauthenticated attacker can use the firmware update feature on the LAN interface of the device to reset the password for the predefined, low-privileged user “user-app” to the default password.

item.title: CVE-2024-3913|2024-08-13T13:56:57.855Z -- phoenix%20contact -- charx%20sec-3000%20%281139022%29
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use this vulnerability to change the device configuration due to a file writeable for short time after system startup.

item.title: CVE-2024-43393|2024-09-10T08:45:10.306Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can perform configuration changes of the firewall services, including packet filter, packet forwarding, network access control or NAT through the FW_INCOMING.FROM_IP FW_INCOMING.IN_IP FW_OUTGOING.FROM_IP FW_OUTGOING.IN_IP FW_RULESETS.FROM_IP FW_RULESETS.IN_IP environment variable which can lead to a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-43385|2024-09-10T08:43:25.556Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can trigger the execution of arbitrary OS commands as root due to improper neutralization of special elements in the variable PROXY_HTTP_PORT in mGuard devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-43388|2024-09-10T08:44:06.550Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker with write permissions can reconfigure the SNMP service due to improper input validation.

item.title: CVE-2024-43386|2024-09-10T08:43:41.392Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can trigger the execution of arbitrary OS commands as root due to improper neutralization of special elements in the variable EMAIL_NOTIFICATION.TO in mGuard devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-43391|2024-09-10T08:44:42.576Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can perform configuration changes of the firewall services, including packet filter, packet forwarding, network access control or NAT through the FW_PORTFORWARDING.SRC_IP environment variable which can lead to a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-7699|2024-09-10T08:42:55.635Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: An low privileged remote attacker can execute OS commands with root privileges due to improper neutralization of special elements in user data.

item.title: CVE-2024-43390|2024-09-10T08:44:30.792Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can perform configuration changes of the firewall services, including packet forwarding or NAT through the FW_NAT.IN_IP environment variable which can lead to a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-43389|2024-09-10T08:44:19.337Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can perform configuration changes of the ospf service through OSPF_INTERFACE.SIMPLE_KEY, OSPF_INTERFACE.DIGEST_KEY environment variables which can lead to a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-43392|2024-09-10T08:44:56.166Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can perform configuration changes of the firewall services, including packet filter, packet forwarding, network access control or NAT through the FW_INCOMING.FROM_IP FW_INCOMING.IN_IP FW_OUTGOING.FROM_IP FW_OUTGOING.IN_IP environment variable which can lead to a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-7698|2024-09-10T08:42:42.629Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can get access to CSRF tokens of higher privileged users which can be abused to mount CSRF attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-43387|2024-09-10T08:43:54.155Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can read and write files as root due to improper neutralization of special elements in the variable EMAIL_RELAY_PASSWORD in mGuard devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-7734|2024-09-10T08:03:19.477Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit the behavior of the pathfinder TCP encapsulation service by establishing a high number of TCP connections to the pathfinder TCP encapsulation service. The impact is limited to blocking of valid IPsec VPN peers.

item.title: CVE-2024-43385|2024-09-10T14:25:30.320Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can trigger the execution of arbitrary OS commands as root due to improper neutralization of special elements in the variable PROXY_HTTP_PORT in mGuard devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-43388|2024-09-10T14:17:49.005Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker with write permissions can reconfigure the SNMP service due to improper input validation.

item.title: CVE-2024-43386|2024-09-10T14:25:13.169Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can trigger the execution of arbitrary OS commands as root due to improper neutralization of special elements in the variable EMAIL_NOTIFICATION.TO in mGuard devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-7699|2024-09-10T14:25:56.498Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: An low privileged remote attacker can execute OS commands with root privileges due to improper neutralization of special elements in user data.

item.title: CVE-2024-43387|2024-09-10T14:22:52.652Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: A low privileged remote attacker can read and write files as root due to improper neutralization of special elements in the variable EMAIL_RELAY_PASSWORD in mGuard devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-7734|2024-09-10T16:00:45.691Z -- phoenix%20contact -- fl%20mguard%202102
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit the behavior of the pathfinder TCP encapsulation service by establishing a high number of TCP connections to the pathfinder TCP encapsulation service. The impact is limited to blocking of valid IPsec VPN peers.
